akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1594. Prohibition against alterations No person shall detach, alter, deface, or destroy any label provided for in this chapter or the rules and regulations made and promulgated thereunder by the Secretary of Agriculture, or alter or substitute seed in a manner that may defeat the purpose of this chapter. (Aug. 9, 1939, ch. 615, title IV, § 404, 53 Stat. 1286.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSee section 1610 of this title.
